entry.title: $2500 // PRIME ASTORIA LOCATION__BACKYARD__PET FRIENDLY
entry.content:
PRIME ASTORIA LOCATION__BACKYARD__PET FRIENDLY

Listing ID #: 169540
Price: $2,500
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 900 Sq. Ft.
Floor: G
Pets: Small Pets

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
Light
Renovated
Walk In Closet

FULLY RENOVATED TWO BEDROOM APARTMENT SITUATED ON THE GROUND FLOOR IN A QUIET TWO-FAMILY HOME WITH A SEPARATE PRIVATE ENTRANCE. FEATURING HARDWOOD FLOORING AND HIGH CEILINGS THROUGHOUT. MASSIVE LIVING ROOM WITH OVER SIZED WINDOWS BRING IN LOTS OF NATURAL SUNLIGHT! BOTH BEDROOMS FIT A QUEEN AND HAVE PLENTY OF CLOSETS INCLUDING AN ENORMOUS WALK-IN. MODERN ISLAND KITCHEN CAN SEAT 6 AND COMES EQUIPPED WITH BRAND-NEW STAINLESS-STEEL APPLIANCES. BATHROOM IS TILED FROM FLOOR TO CEILING WITH A DEEP SOAKING BATHTUB. HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED.

LOCATED IN THE HEART OF ASTORIA ON A QUIET THREE LINED STREET. STEPS TO THE N/W SUBWAY FOR A 7 MINUTE RIDE INTO MANHATTAN! 30TH AVENUE AROUND THE CORNER FOR EASY ACCESS TO AND ABUNDANCE OF ASTORIA'S FINEST SUPERMARKETS RESTAURANTS, CAFE'S, ETC.

CONTACT YOUR ASTORIA SPECIALIST FOR A VIEWING TODAY.
 

Shahnoor Rahman
